options.name: ban
options.description: Throw the banhammer at a user

options.name: user
options.description: The user to ban

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason why the user needs to be banned

options.name: delete
options.description: Delete messages up to X days old (1-7)

options.name: screenshot
options.description: Evidence to support the ban

options.name: clear
options.description: Clear up to 200 recent messages from the current channel

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount of messages to delete (0-200)

options.name: disconnect-vc
options.description: Disconnect all users from a voice channel

options.name: channel
options.description: Defaults to the VC that you're in (if applicable)

options.name: kick
options.description: Kick a user from the server

options.name: user
options.description: The user to kick

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason why the user needs to be kicked

options.name: screenshot
options.description: Evidence to support the kick

options.name: mute
options.description: Mute a user

options.name: user
options.description: The user to mute

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason why the user needs to be muted

options.name: mute-vc
options.description: Prevent people from talking in a voice channel

options.name: channel
options.description: Defaults to the VC that you're in (if applicable)

options.name: nick
options.description: Change someone's nickname

options.name: user
options.description: The user whose nickname needs to be changed

options.name: name
options.description: The new nickname

options.name: note
options.description: Write down a note about a user's behavior

options.name: user
options.description: The user to create a note for

options.name: note
options.description: The note to write

options.name: unmute
options.description: Unmute a user

options.name: user
options.description: The user to unmute

options.name: unmute-vc
options.description: Allow people to talk in a voice channel

options.name: channel
options.description: Defaults to the VC that you're in (if applicable)

options.name: slowmode
options.description: Slow down the current channel

options.name: delay
options.description: The delay in seconds between messages (default of 15)

options.name: duration
options.description: How long the slowmode should last in minutes (default of 30)

options.name: timeout
options.description: Prevent someone from interacting with the server

options.name: user
options.description: The user to put in time out

options.name: length
options.description: How long (in minutes) to time them out for (default of 10)

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason why they need to be timed out

options.name: trust
options.description: Give a user the trusted role

options.name: user
options.description: The user to trust

options.name: trust-plus
options.description: Give a user the trusted+ role

options.name: user
options.description: The user to give the role to

options.name: trust-audit
options.description: Get a list of members that don't have the trusted role

options.name: user-info
options.description: Get detailed information on a user

options.name: user
options.description: The user to get info on

options.name: days
options.description: How far back to look for infractions

options.name: warn
options.description: Warn a user about their behavior

options.name: user
options.description: The user to warn

options.name: message
options.description: The thing to warn them on

options.name: watch
options.description: Give a user the untrusted role

options.name: user
options.description: The user to give the role to
